product_name: Amphipod Profile Lite Trail Runner Hydration Belt
long_description: Built for ultra runners and fast walkers, the Profile Lite Trail Runner Hydration Belt offers expandable storage and 32 fl. oz. of hydration to keep you feeling strong on the trail.
short_description: Built for ultra runners and fast walkers, the Profile Lite Trail Runner Hydration Belt offers expandable storage and 32 fl. oz. of hydration to keep you feeling strong on the trail.
